docs.title: Welcome
docs.text:
Welcome to the MyAccessID UK User Community website! This site provides resources, documentation, and support for users of the MyAccessID platform in the UK.

This community is being set up via the NetworkPlus project Exploring the Governance Requirements for Enabling UK DRIs to Adopt MyAccessID.

Feel free to explore the site and join the community discussions!

docs.title: Upcoming Workshops
docs.text:
See below for information about upcoming MyAccessID UK User Community Workshops

docs.title: MyAccessID Online Workshop
docs.text:
As part of the NFCS Networkplus project Exploring the Governance Requirements for Enabling UK DRIs to Adopt MyAccessID, the MyAccessID UK User Community is hosting a two-hour online workshop on MyAccessID via Microsoft Teams on 2nd December from 10:00 am to 12:00pm.

To take part in the workshop, please register by completing the form below by 5PM on Friday, 28th November:

Register for workshop

Upon registration, you will receive the Microsoft Teams meeting invitation by email in advance of the workshop. The meeting will be recorded, and the workshop materials will be made available afterwards.

docs.title: Workshop Material
docs.text: The workshop will feature talks from the STFC Hartree Centre, UCL, the University of Bristol, and the University of Cambridge. Topics will include an introduction to MyAccessID and its potential as a federated IAM solution. DRI providers who have implemented MyAccessID will share their experiences, including existing pain points within the service and potential improvements. The talks will be followed by an open Q&A session.
